text: The Miss Perú 1956 pageant was held on July 9, 1956.15 candidates were competing for the national crown that year. The chosen winner represented Peru at the Miss Universe 1954.http://www.pageantopolis.com/universe-lists-p- to-z.htmlThe rest of the finalists would enter in different pageants.http://www.caretas.com.pe/Main.asp? T=3082&idE;=874&idA;=45849#.VAHAs8VdXSE ==Placements== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" !width="220" style="background- color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Final Results !width="300" style="background- color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Contestant |- | Miss Peru Universe 1956 | *22px Callao - Dolores "Lola" Sabogal |- | 1st Runner-Up | *22px Huánuco - Rosario Ponce |- | 2nd Runner-Up | *22px Piura - Violeta Seminario |- | Top 7 | * 22px USA Perú - Edith Beck * 22px Arequipa - Alicia Lizárraga * 22px Moquegua - Nancy Eguren * 22px Loreto - Elena Fateil |} ==Special awards== * Miss Photogenic - Callao - Lola Sabogal * Miss Elegance - Huánuco - Rosario Ponce * Miss Congeniality - Amazonas - Luzmila Duarte ==Delegates== *Amazonas - Luzmila Duarte *Apurímac - Edda Barbis *Arequipa - Alicia Lizárraga *Ayacucho - Teresa Villa *Callao - Lola Sabogal *Distrito Capital - Silvia Kessel *Huánuco - Rosario Ponce *Ica - Rosario Salcedo *Loreto - Elena Fateil *Madre de Dios - Chichi Santana *Moquegua - Nancy Eguren *Piura - Violeta Seminario *San Martín - Maggie Seoane *Tacna - Teresa García *USA Perú - Edith Beck == References == Category:Miss Peru Category:1956 in Peru Category:1956 beauty pageants
title: Miss Perú 1956
